Channel.description: The channels that agents can handle in the Contact Control Panel (CCP).
Channel.markdownDescription:
The channels that agents can handle in the Contact Control Panel (CCP).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: VOICE | CHAT | TASK  
Update requires: No interruption

Concurrency.description: The number of contacts an agent can have on a channel simultaneously.
Concurrency.markdownDescription:
The number of contacts an agent can have on a channel simultaneously.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

BehaviorType.description: Specifies the other channels that can be routed to an agent handling their current channel.
BehaviorType.markdownDescription:
Specifies the other channels that can be routed to an agent handling their current channel.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ROUTE_CURRENT_CHANNEL_ONLY | ROUTE_ANY_CHANNEL  
Update requires: No interruption

CrossChannelBehavior.description: Defines the cross-channel routing behavior that allows an agent working on a contact in one channel to be offered a contact from a different channel.
CrossChannelBehavior.markdownDescription:
Defines the cross-channel routing behavior that allows an agent working on a contact in one channel to be offered a contact from a different channel.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MediaConcurrency.description: Contains information about which channels are supported, and how many contacts an agent can have on a channel simultaneously.
MediaConcurrency.markdownDescription:
Contains information about which channels are supported, and how many contacts an agent can have on a channel simultaneously.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Delay.description: The delay, in seconds, a contact should wait in the queue before they are routed to an available agent.
Delay.markdownDescription:
The delay, in seconds, a contact should wait in the queue before they are routed to an available agent.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Priority.description: The order in which contacts are to be handled for the queue.
Priority.markdownDescription:
The order in which contacts are to be handled for the queue.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

QueueArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the queue.
QueueArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the queue.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/queue/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

RoutingProfileQueueReference.description: Contains the channel and queue identifier for a routing profile.
RoutingProfileQueueReference.markdownDescription:
Contains the channel and queue identifier for a routing profile.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

RoutingProfileQueueConfig.description: Contains information about the queue and channel for which priority and delay can be set.
RoutingProfileQueueConfig.markdownDescription:
Contains information about the queue and channel for which priority and delay can be set.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Type: String

Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/queue/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption
